verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: announced] [ARG1: that he would offer a full pardon to conservative author Dinesh D’Souza , who pleaded guilty in 2014 to violating campaign finance laws]
President Trump announced that he [V: would] offer a full pardon to conservative author Dinesh D’Souza , who pleaded guilty in 2014 to violating campaign finance laws

President Trump announced that [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: offer] [ARG1: a full pardon] [ARG2: to conservative author Dinesh D’Souza , who pleaded guilty in 2014 to violating campaign finance laws]

President Trump announced that he would offer a full pardon to [ARG0: conservative author Dinesh D’Souza] , [R-ARG0: who] [V: pleaded] [ARG1: guilty] [ARGM-TMP: in 2014] [ARG2: to violating campaign finance laws]
President Trump announced that he would offer a full pardon to conservative author Dinesh D’Souza , [ARG0: who] pleaded guilty in 2014 to [V: violating] [ARG1: campaign finance laws]
